With expandable storage options, you can easily store all your files, photos, and videos without worrying about running out of space.

  • 50 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 1/2.76″, 0.64µm, PDAF, OIS
  • 8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/4″, 1.12µm
  • 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)
  • Features: LED flash, panorama, HDR
  • Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fps, 720p@480fps, gyro-EIS
Audio Support
  • Loudspeaker: Yes
  • 3.5mm jack: No
Network
  • Technology: GSM / HSPA / LTE / 5G
  • 2G bands: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
  • 3G bands: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1700(AWS) / 1900 / 2100
  • 4G bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 32, 38, 40, 41, 66
  • 5G bands: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41, 66, 77, 78 SA/NSA/Sub6

Communication and Connectivity Support

  • Type: 5000 mAh
  • Charging: 25W wired

Software

The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G comes with Android 15 right out of the box, which is the latest version of Google’s mobile operating system. This means users can enjoy the newest security updates, system improvements, and all the fresh features that Android has to offer. With Android 15, you can look forward to better privacy controls, enhanced notifications, and an overall smoother experience. On top of Android 15, you’ll find Samsung’s One UI 7, which gives you a personalized and user-friendly interface. One UI 7 is celebrated for its sleek design, easy navigation, and a settings menu packed with features. Samsung has fine-tuned the software to ensure everything runs smoothly, making multitasking a breeze and allowing for easy one-handed use. It’s a great fit for both tech lovers and everyday users alike.

The software also boasts Samsung’s signature features, like Samsung Knox for top-notch security, Samsung DeX for a desktop-like experience, and Edge Panels for quick access to your favorite apps and tools. This means the Galaxy A26 5G will stay relevant and secure as time goes on. Users can look forward to bug fixes, UI tweaks, and new features in future updates. Samsung has also added some AI-powered features in One UI 7 to elevate the user experience. This includes AI-generated summaries, smart app recommendations, and tools for optimizing battery life. These enhancements make for a fast, smooth, and future-ready smartphone experience, making the Galaxy A26 5G an attractive option for anyone who appreciates a modern and feature-rich interface.

Display

The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G comes with a stunning 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display that really brings colors to life, showcasing deep blacks and impressive contrast. Thanks to the AMOLED technology, you get a picture quality that outshines traditional LCD screens, making it perfect for everything from binge-watching videos to gaming and scrolling through your favorite content with incredible clarity. One of the highlights of this display is its 120Hz refresh rate, which means you can enjoy smoother scrolling, fluid animations, and a touch experience that feels super responsive. This feature is a game-changer for gamers and anyone who loves a seamless interaction on their phone. With Samsung’s cutting-edge display technology, the Galaxy A26 5G supports HDR, which enhances color accuracy and contrast.

Performance

Thanks to its 5nm architecture, this chipset offers improved power efficiency and performance compared to earlier models. This makes the Galaxy A26 5G an excellent option for anyone who needs a smartphone that can keep up with heavy usage and demanding applications. On top of that, Samsung’s AI-driven performance optimizations help the device manage resources effectively, preventing overheating and extending battery life. This way, the Galaxy A26 5G can maintain reliable performance all day long.

Camera

The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G comes equipped with a fantastic triple-camera system, highlighted by a 50MP primary sensor that captures stunning, high-resolution photos. This main sensor excels at delivering sharp and vibrant images, even in those tricky low-light situations, all thanks to some clever image processing technology. Next up is the 8MP ultrawide camera, perfect for snapping wide landscapes, group photos, and those sweeping angles. It ensures that you can fit more into your frame without any distortion, making it an ideal companion for your travel adventures and scenic shots. Plus, with Samsung’s advanced stabilization tech, you can say goodbye to motion blur and hello to smooth, professional-looking footage.

Battery

 Plus, it features 25W fast charging, so you can quickly juice up your phone and get back to what you love. In just half an hour, you can see a significant boost in battery life, which is perfect for those who are always on the move. Samsung has also integrated smart battery optimization features that use AI to manage power effectively. This means it can cut down on background app activity and fine-tune performance, ensuring you get the most out of your battery.

Other Alternative Models

Samsung Galaxy A16 5G

Name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE
Short description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE Key Features
  • RAM: 8GB
  • Internal Storage: 128GB, 256GB
  • OS: Android 15, One UI 7
  • Chipset: Exynos 1580 (4 nm)
  • Display:9 inches, 90Hz
  • Connectivity: Bluetooth 5.3, 5G, Wi-Fi, NFC
  • Battery: Li-Po 8000 mAh, 45W wired, QC2.0
  • Colors: Silver, Gray, Blue.
Description:
Premium Design with Sleek and Modern Aesthetics

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE boasts a refined, premium design that reflects Samsung’s commitment to elegance and durability. Its slim profile makes it comfortable to hold, while the lightweight build ensures effortless portability for both work and leisure. The smooth metallic finish gives it a high-end look, making it suitable for professional settings and casual use alike. This tablet is designed to blend style and functionality seamlessly.

Its minimal bezels and sleek edges enhance the immersive display experience while keeping the device compact. The precision-cut aluminum body provides structural strength, ensuring it can withstand the demands of daily use. The finish resists fingerprints and smudges, allowing the tablet to maintain a pristine appearance even after extended handling. This is a device that looks as good as it performs.

Available in multiple color options, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE caters to different style preferences. Whether you prefer a sophisticated graphite tone, a calming pastel, or a vibrant shade, there’s a variant that matches your personality. Samsung’s careful attention to color harmony ensures each option feels both modern and timeless.

The tablet’s balanced weight distribution makes it easy to hold for extended periods without fatigue, whether you’re reading, sketching, or watching movies. Its form factor also makes it easy to slip into a backpack, briefcase, or handbag, making it a travel-friendly device that’s always ready when you are.

The Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s design incorporates strategically placed buttons and ports for convenience. USB-C connectivity, speaker grills, and volume controls are positioned for intuitive access, enhancing usability. The tablet also features a magnetic area for securely attaching the S Pen, ensuring it’s always within reach.

Ultimately, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE offers a premium, thoughtfully crafted design that balances elegance with everyday practicality, making it a perfect companion for both productivity and entertainment.

 Large Immersive Display for Work and Play

One of the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s most impressive features is its expansive display, delivering vibrant visuals and exceptional clarity. The large screen provides ample real estate for multitasking, whether you’re editing documents, creating digital art, or enjoying high-definition content. Samsung’s advanced display technology ensures bright, sharp, and color-accurate visuals in any lighting condition.

The high-resolution panel makes movies, games, and photos come to life with vivid colors and deep contrasts. Whether you’re streaming a TV series, playing graphics-rich games, or reviewing creative projects, the viewing experience remains immersive and visually pleasing. The wide viewing angles ensure clarity even when sharing the screen with others.

Adaptive brightness automatically adjusts screen levels based on your surroundings, reducing eye strain and improving comfort during long sessions. This makes the tablet ideal for students, professionals, and artists who spend hours working or studying on-screen.

The display’s smooth refresh rate ensures fluid motion, whether you’re scrolling through web pages, sketching with the S Pen, or playing fast-paced games. This responsiveness is particularly valuable for digital artists, as it enables natural and precise input when drawing or writing.

For multitasking, Samsung’s split-screen and multi-window features take full advantage of the display size. You can run multiple apps side by side, making it easier to research, communicate, and create without constantly switching between windows.

In summary, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s display transforms every activity into a visually rich and engaging experience, making it a versatile tool for productivity, creativity, and entertainment.

 Powerful Performance with Smooth Multitasking

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE is powered by a high-performance processor designed to handle demanding tasks with ease. Whether you’re running productivity apps, engaging in creative workflows, or playing graphically intensive games, the tablet delivers smooth and responsive performance. The processor works in harmony with ample RAM to ensure fast app launches and seamless multitasking.

Samsung’s software optimization further enhances performance by efficiently managing resources. This allows you to switch between multiple applications without lag, making the device a productivity powerhouse for students, professionals, and creators alike. The tablet’s hardware is built to support both everyday tasks and intensive workloads without slowing down.

Gaming enthusiasts will appreciate the tablet’s ability to handle modern mobile games with rich graphics and complex mechanics. The smooth gameplay and minimal load times make it a portable gaming solution for on-the-go entertainment. Paired with the immersive display, it creates an engaging and dynamic experience.

For creative professionals, the processing power ensures smooth performance when using demanding design and editing apps. Whether sketching in high resolution, editing videos, or rendering 3D models, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE keeps pace with your imagination.

The tablet’s performance is complemented by a well-optimized user interface that enhances usability. Navigation feels fluid, and background processes are managed intelligently to maintain efficiency. Even after prolonged use, the system remains responsive, thanks to Samsung’s focus on reliability and stability.

Ultimately, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s processing power makes it a capable all-rounder, ready to meet the needs of entertainment, productivity, and creativity in a single portable device.

S Pen Integration for Creativity and Productivity

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE comes with S Pen support, making it a versatile tool for note-taking, sketching, and creative design. The S Pen offers precision input with low latency, allowing for a natural writing and drawing experience that feels like pen on paper. This makes it ideal for students, artists, and professionals who value digital handwriting and creativity.

The magnetic attachment ensures the S Pen is always close at hand and securely stored when not in use. It’s easy to grab for quick notes during meetings, brainstorming sessions, or while studying. The S Pen’s responsiveness and pressure sensitivity allow for detailed sketches, smooth shading, and precise annotations.

Samsung’s suite of productivity apps, such as Samsung Notes, enhances the S Pen experience. You can jot down handwritten notes, convert them to text, annotate PDFs, or create diagrams effortlessly. These features make the tablet an excellent choice for education and professional environments.

For creative users, the S Pen transforms the tablet into a portable canvas. You can create illustrations, edit photos, and experiment with design concepts directly on the screen. Apps like Clip Studio Paint and Adobe Photoshop are optimized for the S Pen, providing powerful tools for artistic expression.

The S Pen is also useful for navigation, offering precise control when editing documents, selecting text, or managing complex tasks. Its ergonomic design makes it comfortable to use for extended periods, ensuring a fatigue-free creative workflow.

Overall, the S Pen integration elevates the Galaxy Tab S10 FE from a standard tablet to a powerful creative and productivity hub, unlocking new possibilities for work, study, and artistry.

 Long-Lasting Battery with Fast Charging Support

Battery life is a key strength of the Galaxy Tab S10 FE, ensuring you can use it all day without worrying about frequent recharges. The high-capacity battery is optimized to deliver hours of productivity, entertainment, and creativity on a single charge. Whether you’re working on projects, streaming content, or attending virtual meetings, you can count on consistent power.

Samsung’s power management technology maximizes efficiency by adjusting performance based on usage patterns. This means you get the best balance between speed and energy consumption, extending battery life throughout the day.

When it’s time to recharge, fast charging support ensures you spend less time plugged in and more time enjoying your tablet. With a compatible charger, you can quickly replenish the battery to keep your workflow uninterrupted. This is especially useful for travelers and busy professionals with limited charging opportunities.

The long battery life is complemented by intelligent features like adaptive brightness and background process control, which help conserve energy without compromising performance. This makes the tablet an excellent choice for long study sessions, creative marathons, or cross-country flights.

Even with heavy usage, such as video editing or extended gaming, the battery maintains impressive endurance. This reliability makes the Galaxy Tab S10 FE a trustworthy partner for both work and leisure.

In short, the combination of a powerful battery and fast charging capabilities ensures that the Galaxy Tab S10 FE is always ready when you need it, no matter where your day takes you.

Name: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G
Short description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G Key Features
  • Display: 6.7-inch, Dynamic AMOLED 2X
  • RAM: 8GB
  • Internal Storage: 256GB
  • OS: Android 16, One UI 8
  • Chipset: Exynos 2400e (4 nm) / MediaTek Dimensity 9400
  • Main Camera: 50MP+8MP+12MP
  • Selfie Camera: 12MP
  • Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi 6e, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, USB-C, GPS
  • Battery: 4900mAh, 45W
  • Colors: IcyBlue, Jetblack, White, Navy.
Description:
Design and Display
The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G showcases an elegant and modern design that delivers a perfect balance between beauty and practicality. It features a premium aluminium frame with Gorilla Glass protection on both sides, ensuring durability while maintaining a sleek and lightweight feel in the hand. The flat edges and thin bezels provide a refined look that aligns with Samsung’s flagship standards, giving the phone a professional yet stylish appearance. The build quality reflects Samsung’s commitment to creating phones that look and feel premium, even in the Fan Edition lineup.

Its 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display offers stunning colour accuracy and brightness, delivering a vivid and immersive viewing experience. With a 120Hz adaptive refresh rate, scrolling and animations appear exceptionally smooth whether browsing or gaming. The high-resolution panel ensures crisp detail, making videos and images come alive with remarkable clarity. This display also supports HDR10+, ensuring deeper contrasts and more realistic tones in supported content. Combined with Samsung’s excellent outdoor visibility, users enjoy great performance in both bright sunlight and low-light conditions.

The phone’s symmetrical design emphasises simplicity, with the camera array seamlessly blending into the back for a clean finish. Available in various elegant color options, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G allows users to express personality without sacrificing sophistication. The IP68 water and dust resistance rating adds peace of mind for everyday use, making it suitable for both professional and active lifestyles.

 Performance and Software
At the core of the Galaxy S25 FE 5G lies a 4nm Exynos 2400 processor (or Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 FE in select regions), designed to deliver high efficiency and power. This cutting-edge chipset handles multitasking, gaming, and demanding applications with ease, ensuring consistent speed and responsiveness. The 8GB or 12GB of LPDDR5X RAM allows seamless switching between apps and sustained performance, even during heavy workloads. Users can expect flagship-level capabilities for productivity and entertainment alike.

The phone comes with up to 256GB of UFS 4.0 storage, offering ample space for apps, photos, and videos while delivering ultra-fast data transfer speeds. This ensures minimal loading times and smoother operation, even with resource-intensive apps. Paired with Samsung’s advanced cooling technology, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G maintains optimal performance during extended gaming or 4K video recording sessions.

Running on Android 16 with One UI 8.0, the device offers a smooth, intuitive interface filled with customization options and AI-driven enhancements. Samsung’s promise of up to seven years of OS and security updates guarantees long-term reliability, allowing users to keep their device current for years. The inclusion of Galaxy AI features such as live translation, circle-to-search, and intelligent photo editing further enhances productivity and convenience.

Camera System
The Galaxy S25 FE 5G brings flagship-level camera technology to a more affordable price segment, boasting a triple rear camera setup. The main 50MP wide sensor with optical image stabilisation ensures sharp, vibrant photos even in low light. The 12MP ultra-wide camera captures stunning landscapes and group shots, while the 8MP telephoto lens provides up to 3x optical zoom for detailed distant shots. Together, these sensors deliver versatility for any photographic situation, maintaining clarity and color accuracy across all modes.

Samsung’s AI-powered image processing enhances every photo, optimising colour balance, exposure, and detail automatically. Night mode has been refined to capture well-lit, low-noise images even in challenging lighting conditions. Portrait shots benefit from natural depth effects, while Pro Mode allows experienced photographers to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance manually.

Video recording performance is equally impressive, supporting up to 8K resolution at 24fps and 4K at 60fps. With features such as Super Steady stabilization and HDR recording, videos remain smooth and vivid even during motion. The 12MP front camera delivers sharp selfies and excellent video call quality, supported by AI facial optimisation that enhances skin tones naturally. The Galaxy S25 FE 5G redefines what a Fan Edition camera can achieve.

 Battery and Charging
Equipped with a large 4,900mAh battery, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G provides all-day power for streaming, gaming, and productivity. The phone’s adaptive power management intelligently adjusts performance to extend usage, ensuring energy efficiency without sacrificing speed. Whether using 5G, the high refresh rate display, or demanding applications, the battery is built to last through busy schedules.

Charging is equally efficient, with 45W Super Fast Charging support that can power the device from 0% to over 60% in about 30 minutes when using a compatible charger. Wireless charging adds flexibility, while reverse wireless charging lets users power accessories like earbuds or smartwatches directly from the phone. This versatility ensures convenience whether at home or on the go.

Thanks to Samsung’s advanced battery health protection, long-term use doesn’t compromise capacity as quickly. Adaptive charging and thermal management systems protect the device from overheating, extending its battery lifespan. For those who rely on their phone throughout the day, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G offers reliable endurance with rapid refueling when needed.

 Connectivity and Features
The Galaxy S25 FE 5G supports the latest 5G connectivity for ultra-fast downloads, low latency gaming, and seamless video streaming. With Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.4, and NFC, users experience excellent wireless performance and compatibility with modern accessories. The inclusion of eSIM support provides flexibility for managing personal and business lines, making it ideal for travelers and professionals.

The stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos deliver immersive, balanced audio for music, videos, and calls. Samsung’s in-display ultrasonic fingerprint sensor ensures secure and quick authentication, while face recognition offers another fast unlocking method. The device also includes Samsung Knox security, protecting data and transactions at both hardware and software levels.

Additional features like Smart View, DeX Mode, and seamless device integration with Galaxy Buds and Watches elevate the user experience. The phone supports a variety of accessories and has been optimized for connectivity with the Samsung ecosystem, ensuring smooth synchronization across devices. Every feature contributes to a user experience that feels truly complete.

Overall Value
The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G stands out as one of the best value flagship alternatives on the market, combining high-end specifications with a competitive price point. It brings many of the features from the Galaxy S25 series—premium design, strong performance, powerful cameras, and long-term support—into a more affordable package without significant compromise.

For users who demand flagship-level performance without paying a premium, the S25 FE 5G is an ideal choice. It delivers the same polished experience as higher-tier models, making it suitable for both casual users and professionals. Whether for photography, gaming, or productivity, the phone adapts smoothly to every need.
